SELECT tb110.ball_number, count(*) as ballCount FROM tb21_110_lotto_ball tb110 WHERE tb110.del_flag = 'N'
and tb110.ball_number IN (${searchNumber})
and tb110.bonus_yn = "Y"
AND tb110.history_idx BETWEEN ${startYear} AND ${endYear}
GROUP BY tb110.ball_number
order by count(*) desc order by count(*) asc order by tb110.ball_number desc order by tb110.ball_number desc
limit 0,#{searchNumberCount}

SELECT tb100.history_idx, a.ballList, (SELECT c.ball_number FROM tb21_110_lotto_ball c WHERE tb100.history_idx = c.history_idx AND c.bonus_yn = 'Y' AND c.del_flag = 'N') AS bonus_number FROM tb21_100_lotto_history tb100 LEFT JOIN (SELECT tb110.history_idx, group_concat(tb110.ball_number SEPARATOR ',') AS ballList FROM tb21_110_lotto_ball tb110 WHERE tb110.del_flag = 'N' AND tb110.bonus_yn = 'N' GROUP BY tb110.history_idx) a ON tb100.history_idx = a.history_idx WHERE tb100.del_flag = 'N' and tb100.history_idx like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') order by tb100.history_key desc limit #{limitStartPage},#{limitEndPage}

SELECT count(*) FROM tb21_100_lotto_history tb100 LEFT JOIN (SELECT tb110.history_idx, group_concat(tb110.ball_number SEPARATOR ',') AS ballList FROM tb21_110_lotto_ball tb110 WHERE tb110.del_flag = 'N' AND tb110.bonus_yn = 'N' GROUP BY tb110.history_idx) a ON tb100.history_idx = a.history_idx WHERE tb100.del_flag = 'N' and tb100.history_idx like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') order by tb100.history_key desc
